title: Now I like it.
comment: I appreciate the great idea. Thanks you fixed the bug. 👌👏. I'm looking forward to a simple widget for that day's entry.
Bug is fixed, please check v1.2.1

title: I love it! But..
comment: "Could not create external storage" :( also, can there be a widget feature? As well as rearranging the order of habits :)

title: UI too crowded
comment: The UI gets really crowded if you have a lot of tracks. The deus should add horizontal scrolling.

title: Simply works
comment: Does what it's supposed to do, track stuff easily, draws useful graphs.  5/5

title: Absolutely fantastic
comment: Nice, simple, interface to tick off whether you're adhering to your goals. No unnecessary permissions is an additional bonus.   The only grouch is, and I feel I am not being very gracious here, that there is no option to transpose the goals into rows and the days into columns. The tick-off buttons get a wee bit narrow if one is tracking more than, say, six goals.   Five stars, nevertheless.

title: Great app, would be significantly more useful with widget
comment: Great simple app, would be ideal to have it as a bar on my home screen so I see it more regularly to remind me to use it!

title: Simple and Great
comment: Perfect for making sure I do certain things and limiting the number of times I do others. . The only thing I want is the ability to sort and organize the order after they've been added.
Thanks, this was suggested multiple times already, it will appear soon :)

title: Seems nifty
comment: Does exactly what it says in a easy to use format

title: Simple, Easy, Interesting
comment: I like it a lot.  I think it's great, and the new counting feature is fantastic.  Now all that I want is a backup and restore function and I think it's perfect
Thanks for you comment, export and import feature is now included.
I just need a widget and its complete!!!
